import React from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { CCardImage, CCardTitle, CCardText, CAvatar, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CTable, CTableBody, CTableDataCell, CTableHead, CTableHeaderCell, CTableRow, CInputGroup, CInputGroupText, CFormSelect, CForm, CModal, CModalHeader, CModalTitle, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CFormInput, CFormLabel, CFormFloating, } from '@coreui/react' import { cilLockLocked, cilUser, cilCalendar } from '@coreui/icons' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' const LeaseModal = (props) =>{ const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false) const [email, setEmail] = useState(props.email) const [building_no, setBNo] = useState() const [unit_no, setUNo] = useState() const [room, setRoom] = useState() const [from_date, setFromDate] = useState() const [to_date, setToDate] = useState() const [rent, setRent] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const leaseInfo = {email, building_no, unit_no, room, from_date, to_date, rent}; fetch('http://localhost:8080/createLease', { method:'POST', body: JSON.stringify(leaseInfo), }).then(() => { setVisible(false) console.log(leaseInfo); }) } console.log(JSON.parse(props.data)); return( <> setVisible(!visible)}>Get Details setVisible(false)}> {props.cardName} Assign Room To Accepted Applicant setBNo(parseInt(e.target.value))} placeholder="Building No" id="Building_No" /> setFStatus(e.target.value)} id="furniture"> Building Number setUNo(parseInt(e.target.value))} placeholder="Unit No" id="Unit_No" /> Unit Number setRoom(parseInt(e.target.value))} placeholder="Room" id="Room" /> Room setFromDate(e.target.value)} type="date" placeholder="From Date" id="From_Date" /> From Date setToDate(e.target.value)} type="date" placeholder="To Date" id="To_Date" /> To Date {setRent(parseInt(e.target.value)) setEmail(props.email)}} placeholder="Rent (Monthly)" id="Rent" /> Rent
Create Lease
setVisible(false)}> Close ) } export default LeaseModal;
